title: Excellence in A/L Physical Science & Programming
description: A very strong foundation in advanced mathematics (Combined Maths) and Physics is the absolute prerequisite. Alongside A/Ls, start self-learning Python and foundational computer science concepts.

title: Bachelor's Degree in CS/Engineering with Research Focus
description: Enroll in a rigorous Computer Science or Engineering program. Actively seek out research opportunities with professors, contribute to projects, and aim to publish a paper as an undergraduate. Focus on theoretical and mathematical courses.
qualifications: BSc in Computer Science/Engineering with First Class Honors

title: Master's and/or PhD in AI/ML
description: This is the most critical step. A postgraduate degree (usually a PhD for pure research roles) is mandatory. This is where you will specialize in a sub-field (e.g., NLP, Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning) and conduct novel research.

title: AI Researcher / Research Scientist
description: Join an academic research lab or an industrial R&D lab. Your primary role is to develop new AI algorithms and techniques, run experiments, and publish your findings in top-tier conferences and journals.
qualifications: A strong publication record (e.g., in NeurIPS, ICML, CVPR)
institutes: R&D Labs of major tech companies (Google, Meta - often abroad)
Local R&D centers (e.g., WSO2 Research, Vega Innovations)

title: Senior AI Researcher / Principal Investigator
description: Become a leader in your research field. You will lead a research team, define the research agenda, secure funding, and make significant contributions to the field of Artificial Intelligence. This is a globally recognized, expert-level role.
qualifications: Recognized as an expert in your sub-field
